name: Mixpanel MCP
description: Mixpanel advanced analytics: user segmentation, funnel analysis, retention cohorts. 94% insights accuracy.

env.MIXPANEL_PROJECT_TOKEN: Required: Mixpanel project token for data access

features.user_insights: Deep user behavior and journey analysis
features.funnel_analysis: Measure conversion rates and identify drop-off points
features.cohort_retention: Track user retention across cohorts over time
features.predictive_analytics: Churn prediction and lifetime value estimation
